exchangeLuckyballComment: Ua kūʻai ʻoe i kāu mau helu no ka Pōʻalima.
inviteLuckyballComment: Ua loaʻa iā ʻoe kahi Pōleʻa Laki no ke kono ʻana i kahi hoaaloha.
purchaseGiftCardByPoint: Ua kūʻai ʻoe i nā helu no kahi kāleka makana.
purchaseProductByPoint: Ua kūʻai ʻoe i kāu mau helu no nā mea kūʻai.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: Ua hoʻohana ʻoe i ka Pōhaku Laki e komo i ka Huki Laki.
winLotteryPointSubject: Ua lanakila ʻoe i ka hailona
winLotteryPointComment: Ua loaʻa iā ʻoe nā helu no ka lanakila ʻana i ka Lotto.
partnerMailContents1: E ʻoluʻolu e nānā i nā palapala i koi ʻia no ka ʻae ʻana o ka hoa a hoʻouna i kahi pane me ka faila i hoʻopili ʻia!
partnerMailContents3:
E ʻoluʻolu e hoʻopili i kahi kope o kāu kāleka ID a i ʻole passport
e hōʻoia i kou hoa pili.
partnerMailContents5:
E ʻoluʻolu e nānā i nā palapala a me nā ʻike e pono ai
no ka ʻae ʻana o ka hoa a hoʻouna mai iā mākou i pane!
partnerMailContents6: (Ke ʻano hana, ka helu alahele, ka helu moʻokāki, ka inoa mua o ka mea nona ka moʻokāki, ka inoa waena, ka inoa hope, ka helu kelepona paʻa o ka mea lawe, etc.)
partnerMailContents8:
E ʻoluʻolu e hoʻouna mai i kahi helu kelepona iā ʻoe
e kamaʻilio me kāu hoa.
partnerMailContents9:
E ʻoluʻolu e hoʻouna i kāu pane ma ka leka uila iā partner@buflexz.com .
Ma hope o ka nānā ʻana o ka hui hana i ka pane, e hana ʻia ka nānā ʻana a me ka ʻae ʻia.
authMailContents1: E hoʻouna mākou iā ʻoe i kahi helu hōʻoia leka uila.
authMailContents3: Ua hoʻopuka ʻia kahi kī hōʻoia no ka hōʻoia leka uila.
authMailContents4:
E ʻoluʻolu e hoʻokomo pololei i ka helu hōʻoia 6-helu i ka hōʻoia
pukaaniani i loko o ka app a i ʻole kope a paʻi i ka helu hōʻoia.
authMailContents5:
No ka hoʻouna wale ʻana kēia leka uila.
ʻAʻole hiki ke pane, no laila inā he nīnau a pilikia paha kāu,
e ʻoluʻolu e kelepona mai iā mākou ma o ke kikowaena mea kūʻai aku i loko o ka app BUFLEXZ.
